title: Apparently it's Reverting time
body:

replies.body: You think Renekton change was a nerf?

are you stupid? losing 100 hp at lvl 6 made him 1v2ing the jungle+top way way less often, the nerf was so hard that they partially reverted it Bonus health changed to 250 / 500 / 750 from 200 / 400 / 800, now revert it entierly.
Because we totally want "Can your top beat Renek? No? Then it's not viable" bullshit again?

I prefer Renekton meta over this shitty thing we have now were it's like
-Is your toplaner good at facing ranged champs? -no? unviable
-does your toplane have an aoe stun/nuke spell?- no? unviable
-is your toplane good on a gold deficit? - no? unviable i litterally havent touched toplane in ages even playing adc is more fun than playing toplane atm and trust me i hate adc with a burning passion.
So does that mean Leona should be a good top laner? I'm not arguing, it just occurred to me that she met all those criteria and that gave me a little chuckle.

Have you tried sunfire+IBG Leona? Its actually pretty damn strong if you can get past super early game maxing Q first. 

I think its better in the jungle so you can build Abyssal without being punished by lack of HP due to Cinderhulk+SotA. Abyssal alone puts her base damages back to her old values, and makes her do significantly more damage with what was added to her ult and the MR reduction. Grab Warmog's to ensure you have enough HP to go along with your resists and fill you out at 40% CDR, which gives you 33% uptime on your stun and practically a 30 second CD on your R. 

You end up being able to 1 shot carries as essentially full-tank, and a stun to follow-up if you don't.  Randuin's+Tabi to ensure you can kill them before they kill you, provided your team decides to sit around and do nothing. If you can start with E, you can kill them before they retaliate E->Q->R->Q->E->Q. Not bad for building basically tank. 

_______

The biggest issue with a bruiser Leona is early game. Top lane has too much bullshit for her to farm in, and jungle she's too punishable early on, although her clear-speed becomes pretty damn good after Cinder, and practically instant with sheen.
She's pretty bad versus a ranged champ alone though.
Old leona would work this one got her shit toned down so no she can't. i dunno how good she would be with trinity into full tank tho.
